thread.title: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Modi to his wedding
thread.title_full: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Modi to his wedding - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Modi to his wedding
text:
NEW DELHI: Indian offspinner Harbhajan Singh on Saturday met Prime Minister Narendra Modi and invited him for his marriage, scheduled later this month. 

A photo of an excited Harbhajan shaking hands with the head of the state was posted on the PMO handle with a caption 'Cricketer Harbhajan Singh met PM'. 

Harbhajan, who was part of the Indian T20 squad that lost to South Africa, is tying the nuptial knot with long-time actor-girlfriend Geeta Basra.
